verbose_text: In contrast, inhibition of Hsp90 expression in A549 and H460 cells by siRNA against Hsp90 or treatment with 17-AAG (an Hsp90 inhibitor) significantly increased LC3 puncta accumulation and LC3-II conversion in HyFS treated cells.
evidence: Hsp90 expression in A549 and H460 cells by siRNA against Hsp90 or treatment with 17-AAG (an Hsp90 inhibitor) significantly increased LC3
